functional_units.name: FilesystemAccessKit Core APIs
functional_units.description: Provides file system operations such as openFile, saveFile, createBookmark, and resolveBookmarkData for user-selected files.

functional_units.name: Bookmark Persistence Schema Design
functional_units.description: Defines a schema to persist bookmarks aligned with recents/session storage for seamless integration.

functional_units.name: CLI Sandbox Profile Guidance
functional_units.description: Offers guidance on sandbox profiles covering com.apple.security.files.user-selected.read-write and automation workflows for headless usage.

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Runs random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.

functional_units.name: ParseTree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Executes SwiftUI automation flow tests for parse tree streaming selection on macOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS, maintaining throughput parity with CLI harness.

functional_units.name: Session Persistence Error Surface
functional_units.description: Surfaces session persistence errors through diagnostics plumbing once logging pipeline is available.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Bookmark Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconciles CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities based on defined reconciliation rules.

functional_units.name: Recents Persistence Error Surface
functional_units.description: Surfaces recents persistence errors via diagnostics plumbing once logging pipeline is available.

functional_units.name: Notarized Build Apple Events Automation Tracking
functional_units.description: Tracks outcomes of notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and extends entitlements safely.
